fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 170.08 lakh crore compared with Rs 195.71 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 86 points or 0.48% to settle at 18,015.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, tumbled 4.40% to 12.86. Reliance Industries (RIL), Adani Enterprises, and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
